oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Anna E. Peck to her cousin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Anna E. Peck to her cousin, Pvt. John N. Warlick, Co. G, 55th Tenn. Vol. Inf. Regt., CSA, thanking him for news of her brother who was in Maryland. She writes, "his heart and soul is with us, who are only contending for our own rights. Oh when will this cruel blood shed end." The letter also details the fates of friends and family members who are fighting in the war, including her son who "has hired a substitute over 50 years old to go in his place."
